dialogueLines.line: ...I don't know...singing with you kind of makes my heart feel better.
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: I've stopped wanting to eat people... I wonder if my lost memories and singing have something to do with it...?
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: What do you think! Rap battles are fun!
dialogueLines.speaker: bf

dialogueLines.line: Yeah, it's not so bad to be honest.
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: Maybe rap battles are one way to get my memory back...
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: Oh, yeah! If I can make one wish come true, why don't I ask for all my memories back! That way, all my problems would be solved at once!
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: Alright! If that's the case, then Zombie Lily's All-You-Can-Eat Tour, renamed Zombie Lily's Rap Battle Tour! Let's begin!
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: (Huh, that was a close one... now my plan is going to work just fine...)
dialogueLines.speaker: bf
